data.prayer: Father, for those with enemies and who are afraid in Mafraq, call them into your shelter and safety today.
data.verse: For you have been a refuge for me, a strong tower from the enemy.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Mafraq, Jordan
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, we know that cultures come and go, even in the state of Mafraq, but the truth of your Word endures generations.
data.verse: Your Word, Lord, is eternal; it stands firm in the heavens.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 375 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, help your children in Mafraq, Jordan find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

data.prayer: Jesus, please help the 657 believers in the state of Mafraq to be filled with joyful obedience at all times, as you modeled for us all.
Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Druze people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Father, encourage the 657 believers to have boldness before you, since they have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus the Son of God.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Father, bring yourself glory in Mafraq. Through your servants plant 49 new churches that love you, love one another, and make disciples this year.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the LORD as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: God, we pray both the men and women of Mafraq, Jordan will find ways to meet in groups of two or three to encourage and correct one another from your Word.
